attributes.action: Impose the Sino-British Deal & Hong Kong’s liberty against China’s Intergration.
attributes.background: Hong Kong and China are getting closer. This is not a good thing. In the Sino-British joint declaration it was said that Hong Kong would have 50 years of the rights they had under British law. This is not the case today, as China is restricting rights to run in elections if you’re not Pro-Beijing.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
